sentences.en: He was ever a little beforehand and never lived precariously.
sentences.cn: 他的收入一向稍多于开支,而从未过拮据的生活.

sentences.en: How could she tell beforehand that I was going to go out?
sentences.cn: 她怎么会事先知道我要出去？

sentences.en: I'm always beforehand with the rent.
If I'd known this beforehand, I would not have gone back.
sentences.cn: 早知如此, 我就不回去了.

sentences.en: It is reasonable to assume that he knew beforehand that this would happen.
sentences.cn: 有理由认为他事先就知道会发生这样的事。

sentences.en: It wasn't a spur-of-the-moment decision. We discussed it in detail beforehand.
sentences.cn: 这可不是头脑一热作出的决定。我们事先仔细地讨论过。

sentences.en: Make a list of your questions beforehand.
Rehearse and role-play the interview with a friend beforehand.
sentences.cn: 事先和朋友通过角色扮演排练一下面试。

sentences.en: Saunas can be hazardous if misused. Avoid a big meal beforehand.
sentences.cn: 洗桑拿浴如果方法不当会有危险，浴前切忌饱食。

sentences.en: The police need to be briefed beforehand on how to deal with this sort of situation.
sentences.cn: 需要事先告诉警察这种情况怎样处理。

sentences.en: They proposed to make arrangement beforehand.
sentences.cn: 他们提议事先做好安排.

sentences.en: We congratulate you beforehand on your success.
We had to get these animals over beforehand.
sentences.cn: 我们得先把这些牲畜赶过去.

sentences.en: When you give a speech, it’s natural to feel nervous beforehand.
sentences.cn: 你在演讲之前感到紧张是很自然的。

trans.tran_en: before something else happens or is done
